title: Who is John Moran?
body: Born in London, living in Barcelona since 2016, I've no plans to leave, I have a daughter and lovely apartment near the beach in El Prat. I love Front End Development and all things javascript - making apps that work well and look beautiful.

title: Why should you consider him for the job?
body: I used to be a graphic designer but have been coding for the web since 2013, so you'll be getting an all rounder. I still have things to learn but that makes me hungry to work and do more projects with enthusiasm

title: Can you really trust this guy?
body: I'm not planning on moving overseas! I would like to settle into a long term job, grow within a company and to work for a good cause like helping people with diabetes will give me more motivation to get out of bed everyday.
